#What are GANs?

#Slideshow

This is the slide deck teaching important concepts for this entire topic.
Check out the Teacher’s Guide here.

Get a slideshow copy.

#Activities

The following activities are supplementary activities that kids should complete to reinforce these important concepts. These activities are listed in the order we suggest you follow.

#Activity 1. Color Matching Game

  • Links: Color Matching Worksheet
  • Pre-Reqs: “Classifying vs. Generating AI” Slideshow
  • Suggested Length: 20 min
  • Tech Dependencies: Google Chrome
  • Key Concepts: Classifier, Generator
  • Group Reqs: None
  • Description: Students will classify colors against a color wheel and color chart.

#Activity 2. Classifier or Generator

  • Links:
    1. Classifier or Generator Google Form
    2. Classifier or Generator Activity Slides
  • Pre-Reqs: “Classifying vs. Generating AI” Slideshow
  • Suggested Length: 60 min
  • Tech Dependencies: Google Chrome
  • Key Concepts: Classifier, Generator
  • Group Reqs: None
  • Description: Students review the difference between classifiers and generators by identifying whether various entities are classifiers or generators.

#Generator VS. Discriminator
